c74object.name: ibuffermulti~
c74object.digest: Host multiple ibuffer~s in one object
c74object.description: ibuffermulti~ is a dynamic and memory efficient audio file loading solution that can host up to 4096 internal ibuffer~s.

method.name: clear
method.description: Delete all the currently hosted ibuffer~s

method.name: load
method.description:
Send in the load message to load an ibuffer~ into ibuffermulti~.
The full message should be formatted as:
load / buffer name / audio file name
You may also specify the channel at the end of the message similarily to ibuffer~.

entry.name: Number of hosted ibuffers
entry.description: Output the number of hosted ibuffer~s as an int.
